[center]A little About us.Toxic-x is a new PVP server solely based on FUN we are not the type of server searching for players to donate to shut the server down a few weeks later. We have a great community and Friendly hardworking staff members. We are 24/7 VPS hosted All we want is a nice player base to enjoy the server as much as we did developing it. COME CHECK US OUT AT[/center] [URL=http://"www.toxic-x.org"]www.toxic-x.org[/URL]
[URL=http://"www.toxic-x.org"]www.toxic-x.org[/URL]
Features
[ul][center]Flawless Switching All Spec attacks working Banks around the map are safe zones Out side of banks PK area 10 Second PVP timer Fun pk zone Multi Zone 100% curses including Leeches Multi barrage Zaryte bow with spec attack Chill Zone/ Alter area Friendly staff 24/7 VPS Nex items with HP bonus Alot more COME CHECK US OUT[/center] [list][li] [/li] [li][/li] [/list]
